description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Test your skills at skiing and shooting simultaneously! With 16 levels of action packed mayhem on four different level classes: Bunny, Blue, Black Diamond and Murderhorn, Trickshot will show you no mercy on the slopes. Did we mention you’ll have to dodge mines in the process?
